formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For an estimated nameplate FLA at full load: Three-phase: $I_{FLA} = \dfrac{P_{out}}{\sqrt{3}\, V \, \eta \, PF}$, where $P_{out} = \text{HP} \times 746\,\text{W}$ Single-phase: $I_{FLA} = \dfrac{P_{out}}{V \, \eta \, PF}$
